ygData.subject: RE: NPC's Binding
ygData.msgSnippet: Trolls definitely, threatened to eat me they did!  But I went in pretty far and the only non-green I saw was a Shin warrior and a Gaz Shaman.  Maybe a party
ygData.messageBody:
Trolls definitely, threatened to eat me they did! But I went in pretty far
and the only non-green I saw was a Shin warrior and a Gaz Shaman. Maybe a
party had just traipsed thru, but there were only 5 people there. 3 30+
people, a lvl 9 troll and me at 15th. No party opportunities there. Went
back and saw 12 people. 6 over 30 again, a party of Trolls, all very evil,
around 20, 2 dark elves at 16 and me. I understand there are higher level
froggies farther in, but what good are the other ones as no one hunts them.
And no, being a tailor and therefore generally poor, woven isn't trash loot
to me. Mesh is what I was really after to replace all my leather until I
get reinforced made. Yah right, in my dreams.

Kitasi the frustrated tailor

-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 1:49 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] NPC's Binding


From: John Kim <kim@...>

On Wed, 14 Jul 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:

> Actually Guk is worse. I'm only 15th and 95% of the
> things I encountered in there were so green they ignored

Have you been far in? It is a *huge* dungeon. Most of the
mobs that give special items in GuK are high teens to mid 20s,
with a few up into the 30s. My friends and I got decimated in
there when we first tried it at L17-19. A couple nights ago,
my L21-26 group of six had a moderately easy time getting to
the froglok lord room, but had to turn around there because of
the multiple yellow/red frogs (to me at 26) that were inside.
The frogloks at the entrance have mostly trash loot (though I
suppose woven armor might not be considered trash).

In Paw, the special items come from low to mid teen mobs, and
the dungeon is not very close to any of the newbie city zones.

> me. I'd say 7th would be good for the outer rooms, but
> what 7th level character is likely to be running thru
> Oasis and S Ro?

Um, trolls maybe? :-)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
